features: Sensitive Skin Friendly: Infused with aloe and cucumber extracts, this sensitive skin friendly makeup setting spray, primer and refresher has your complexion covered; Use it at any stage of your makeup routine or alone to refresh your skin

Prime, Set, Or Refresh: A real triple threat, this multi tasker is a spray on primer, makeup setter, and makeup refresher delivering a dewy burst of hydration with every spritz; This facial spray will be your go to for a fresh, no makeup, makeup look

Face From Foundation To Finish: Complete your makeup look with our full line of face products to aid in color correction and coverage from concealer, blush, bronzer, foundations and contouring to palettes and powders

Cruelty Free Cosmetics: We believe animals belong in our arms, not in a lab; All of our makeup is certified and acknowledged by PETA as a cruelty free brand; We don't test any of our products on animals

Discover NYX Professional Makeup: Try all of our professional makeup products today from eyeshadow, eyeliner, and false lashes to liquid lipstick, lip gloss, primer, concealer, setting sprays and eyebrow makeup
body.description: Put on a fresh face with bare with Me Prime set refresh multitasking Spray. Infused with Aloe and cucumber extracts, our sensitive skin-friendly Spray has your complexion covered every step of the way. Just a few spritzes preps or sets your makeup and perks up any look. This multipurpose mist Also gives skin a dewy glow, minimizes the appearance of pores, and provides up to eight hours of hydration.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Step 1 Spray a few spritzes of Bare With Me Prime. Set. Refresh. Multitasking Spray all over the face to prep and hydrate skin.
Step 2 Add a small amount of Bare With Me Hydrating Jelly Primer directly on the face with your fingers or a foundation brush and allow it to set before applying makeup.
Step 3 Apply the lightweight Bare With Me Tinted Skin Veil with a dual fiber brush and blend out with the Flawless Finish Blending Sponge for a natural finish.

Bare With Me Collection Multitasking Spray Hydrating Jelly Primer Tinted Skin Veil Finish Natural Finish Dewy Finish Creamy Satin Vegan Formula No Vegan Formula Yes Vegan Formula Yes Cruelty-Free Yes Cruelty-Free Yes Cruelty-Free Yes How To Use Spritz this mist over the face before and after makeup application. How To Use Apply a small amount directly to the face + allow to set before applying makeup. How To Use Smooth desired amount onto the face and blend all over.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like this!!
reviews.reviewText: I've been using one of the makeup forever setting sprays and liked it, but recently found out it didn't rate well on Yuka. It's been my goal to find cleaner makeup products so I'd decided to try something else. I hadn't seen this product before, but when I searched setting sprays, I found it, liked the price, and I trust nyx, so I ordered it. The reviews warned of it being pretty matte if used as a primer and setting spray, so I was a little worried because I'm a dry skin girl. I have used it as a primer and setting spray and think it's pretty great! I haven't felt too dry or matte, but all the products I use are moisturizing because of my skin type, so that may be why this product is a success for me. It works great and Yuka says it's pretty clean, so it's a win for me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I have combination skin, so my T-Zone is my main area of concern when it comes to makeup. This spray has a fine mist, no heavy scent, doesn’t leave your face feeling tight or sticky, and it really helps prolong the wear of my makeup, even in my T-Zone. Instead of wetting my beauty blender with water, I just use this sprayWorks like a charm.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Makeup doesn’t really transfer but my makeup doesn’t look as good towards the end of the day it is good to hydrate your makeup if it gets a little dry but make sure you choose a primer by elf so that your makeup sticks more I tested it with no primer since the bottle says it primes but it’s not as good as one of the elf primers I use the elf putty primer btw

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product works great.
reviews.reviewText: I use this as a setting spray and it gives me a light dewy look. It is not to heavy it does not leave my skin feeling oily it is just perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It held my makeup and gave me a great primer base and an amazing glow afterwards. No complaints. Refreshed my face one time during the day just because. Very pretty finish. I do use pink finishing powder with shimmer so it just enhanced that even more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If your face is oily, this product doesn’t work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best setting spray I have tried.
reviews.reviewText: This is perfect for sensitive skin. And last through my entire workday without turning blotchy or rubbing off. Holds my make up in place!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this 2 in 1 product
reviews.reviewText: I love this. The fact that it's a primer and a setting spray is a game changer. Less to put in my makeup bag. And on top of that, you can even use it to refresh your makeup throughout the day and/ or night. It does exactly as it says in that it gives your face a natural finish, which is wonderful for me! I give this a 10/10 and would definitely recommend. Would buy again whenever it runs out; you get a decent size bottle and you don't need a lot. It is not sticky and it has a light scent, kinda floral which is fine with me being I'm not sensitive to smells. Again, I love that it gives me a natural finish to my face!!
This product will set my makeup all day. lovely smell. will purchase again.
Fixe correctement le maquillage toute la journée. Rendu mate j'adore. Rapport qualité prix superbe.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Amazing was the word described to my after my daughter used this for the first time, great coverage and easy to apply, will definitely be buying again, great Valerie money.

Ich sprühen auch meine Haarspitten damit ein ist bombe!!!Fixierung ist ok. Mal schauen wenn es wärmer wird und man schwitzt. Ein bisschen Makeup bleibt doch auf der Maske. Kann man also noch verbessern. Trotzdem bin ich zufrieden. Darum volle 5 Sterne. Da die Haarspitzen nicht nehr so trocken sind. Also vielseitig verwendbar. Super Qualität und top Preis für diese Menge und Produkt.
